#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n, d;
        cin>>n>>d;

        int t[n];
        int sum=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                cin>>t[i];
                sum = sum + t[i];
            }

            int m = sum + (n-1)*10;

            int result=0;

            if(m<=d)
                result = 2*(n-1) + (d-m)/5;  //10 min interval + remaining time
            else
                result = -1;

            cout<<result<<endl;
    }


}
